DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective: To determine the maximum tolerated dose of docetaxel when given with Irinotecan and Carboplatin for the treatment of inoperable lung cancer. Secondary Objective: To evaluate the dose-related toxicities of this triple regimen in patients with inoperable lung cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Docetaxel, Irinotecan, and Carboplatin in Extensive Stage Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A phase I/II dose escalating study to determine the maximum tolerated dose of docetaxel when given with Irinotecan and Carboplatin for the treatment of inoperable lung cancer.
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older unresectable lung cancer measurable or evaluable lesions Karnofsky PS greater than or equal to 60% untreated CNS metastases
